title: cafter
author: cafter
content: i recently broke up and now i am unable to focus on learning and studying, i still love her because she doesn't done anything bad with me. so it's hard to forget about it and focus, so please give me some tips and ideas to get focused.

comments.author: Car22
comments.body: Forget her and be professional in your life . Work hard and get succeed in your life. Set your goals and work on it. Let your success make a noise instead you. Gold diggerÂ  Girls leave someone for money. So first earn money to live a standard life .
